CREATE TABLE rating ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL , user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, movie_id BIGINT NOT NULL, rating INT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CONSTRAINT rating_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT rating_user_movie_uc UNIQUE (user_id, movie_id), CONSTRAINT rating_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT rating_movie_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
